title: Opinion | One Big Idea for Congress: Pay Small Businesses to Pay Their Workers - Politico
description: Wage support is direct, effective, and ensures doors can open again when the virus threat passes. It needs to be part of the relief package — now.
content: So in addition to spending taxpayer dollars on unemployment insurance and direct paymentsmeasures that primarily help people already out of workCongress should prioritize emergency wage support to guarantee workers wont lose their jobs in the coming months in… [+4990 chars]
